refsynopsisdiv.title: Methods

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The interface used for integrating into GNOME Shell's search interface (version 2).

refsect2.title: The GetInitialResultSet() method
refsect2.programlisting: GetInitialResultSet (IN as terms, OUT as results);
refsect2.para: Called when the user first begins a search.

listitem.para: Array of search terms, which the provider should treat as logical AND.

An array of result identifier strings representing items which match the given search terms. Identifiers must be unique within the provider's domain, but other than that may be chosen freely by the provider.

refsect2.title: The GetSubsearchResultSet() method
refsect2.para: Called when a search is performed which is a "subsearch" of the previous search, e.g. the method may return less results, but not more or different results.
This allows search providers to only search through the previous result set, rather than possibly performing a full re-query.

listitem.para: Array of results previously returned by GetInitialResultSet().
Array of updated search terms, which the provider should treat as logical AND.

An array of result identifier strings representing items which match the given search terms. Identifiers must be unique within the provider's domain, but other than that may be chosen freely by the provider.

refsect2.title: The GetResultMetas() method
refsect2.programlisting: GetResultMetas (IN as identifiers, OUT aa{sv} metas);
refsect2.para: Return an array of meta data used to display each given result

listitem.para: An array of result identifiers as returned by GetInitialResultSet() or GetSubsearchResultSet()

A dictionary describing the given search result, containing a human-readable 'name' (string), along with the result identifier this meta is for, 'id' (string). Optionally, 'icon' (a serialized GIcon as obtained by g_icon_serialize) can be specified if the result can be better served with a thumbnail of the content (such as with images). 'gicon' (a serialized GIcon as obtained by g_icon_to_string) or 'icon-data' (raw image data as (iiibiiay) - width, height, rowstride, has-alpha, bits per sample, channels, data) are deprecated values that can also be used for that purpose. A 'description' field (string) may also be specified if more context would help the user find the desired result.

refsect2.title: The ActivateResult() method
refsect2.para: Called when the users chooses a given result. The result should be displayed in the application associated with the corresponding provider. The provided search terms can be used to allow launching a full search in the application.

listitem.para: A result identifier as returned by GetInitialResultSet() or GetSubsearchResultSet()
Array of search terms, which the provider should treat as logical AND.
A timestamp of the user interaction that triggered this call

refsect2.title: The LaunchSearch() method
refsect2.programlisting: LaunchSearch (IN as terms, IN u timestamp);
refsect2.para: Asks the search provider to launch a full search in the application for the provided terms.

listitem.para: Array of search terms, which the provider should treat as logical AND.
A timestamp of the user interaction that triggered this call
